description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Choose one of five gangs and take to the streets to fight for city-wide domination! Out-think and out-manoeuvre the rival gangs to take control of their suburbs in this risk-like turn based strategy game.
description.short: Choose one of five gangs and take to the streets to fight for city-wide domination! Out-think and out-manoeuvre the rival gangs to take control of their suburbs in this risk-like turn based strategy game.
